updates.title: Turn your prompts into visual assets and slide decks with the Figma app in ChatGPT
updates.description: We’re expanding the capabilities of the Figma app in ChatGPT, so you can turn your ideas into creative assets and presentations that you can polish in Figma Buzz and Figma Slides.

updates.title: Charmaine Lee’s 10 rules for building developer tools that feel like magic
updates.description: As a product manager working on Snapchat’s Lens Studio for AR developers, Charmaine knows what it takes to delight creators.

updates.title: Turn your ChatGPT brainstorms into FigJam diagrams
updates.description: With the new Figma app in ChatGPT, you can turn conversations into FigJam diagrams like flow charts, Gantt charts, and more.

updates.title: Config 2024 in review
updates.description: We’re launching Figma AI, UI3, and Figma Slides, along with major updates to Dev Mode and improvements to your favorite Figma features.
